Column I: 10. Organizing participation in trade fairs and exhibitions
11. Copyright matters relating to the administration of the International Convention on Intellectual Property and the World Intellectual Property Office
12. Make the process for patent granting efficient.
13. Formulation and implementation of national pricing policies with regard to consumer goods
14. Taking measures to ensure market competitiveness thereby minimizing the market imperfection and encouraging self-regulation
15. Taking measures to protect the consumers by supplying quality products at minimum competitive prices continuously and preventing speculative behavior of the suppliers
16. Expand cooperative sales outlet network and people-centric goods and services distribution centres
17. All other subjects that come under the purview of Institutions listed in Column II
18. Supervision of all Institutions listed in Column II
